0.2.2 (2009-12-14)
==================

- make tests pass again [garbas]


0.2.1 (2009-12-14)
==================

- made tests independent of python version
- bring back python2.4 compatibility


0.2 (2009-11-20)
================

- Added option to use external patch binary instead of bundled python-patch
- Lets you specify multiple patches.
- Reapplies patches if any of them have changed.
- Aborts if any of the patches are broken.


0.1 (2008-10-27)
==================

- Created recipe with ZopeSkel [garbas]
